Roas.ALERT_MSG_P1: Some ROAs may be missing because the following Trust Anchors still have pending repositories:

Bgp.ALERT_MSG_P1: This page provides a preview of RPKI validity states your routers will associate with BGP announcements. This preview is based on:
Bgp.ALERT_MSG_LI2: BGP announcements that are seen by 5 or more peers.
Bgp.ALERT_MSG_LI4: The validated ROAs found by this RPKI Validator after applying your filters and additional whitelist entries.
Bgp.ALERT_MSG_P2: Please note that the BGP announcements your routers see may differ from the ones listed here.

AnnouncementPreview.TITLE_MODAL_FORM: Please indicate ASN and Prefix in order to view announcements
AnnouncementPreview.TOASTR_MSG_ERROR: Specified prefix and/or ASN are not valid

IgnoreFilters.ALERT_MSG_INTRO: By adding a filter the validator will ignore any RPKI prefixes that overlap with the filter's prefix.
IgnoreFilters.TOASTR_MSG_REQUIRED_PREFIX_OR_ASN: Prefix and/or ASN are required to enable adding.
IgnoreFilters.TOASTR_MSG_ADD_ERROR: Error happened. Filter has not been added. Please try again.
IgnoreFilters.TOASTR_MSG_DELETE_ERROR: Error happened. Filter has not been removed. Please try again.

Whitelist.ALERT_MSG_INTRO_1st: By adding a whitelist entry you can manually authorise an ASN to originate a prefix in addition to the validated ROAs from the repository.
Whitelist.ALERT_MSG_INTRO_2nd: Please note that whitelist entries may invalidate announcements for this prefix from other ASNs, just like ROAs. This may be intentional (you are whitelisting ASN A, ASN B is hijacking), or not (ASN B should also be authorised, or you made a mistake). When you create a whitelist entry here, make sure to check the table below for a report on prefixes validated / invalidated by this entry and verify that no unintentional side effects occured.
Whitelist.TOASTR_MSG_REQUIRED_PREFIX_AND_ASN: Prefix and ASN are required to enable adding.
Whitelist.TOASTR_MSG_ADDED: The entry has been added to the whitelist.
Whitelist.TOASTR_MSG_ADD_ERROR: Error happened. Entry wasn't add to whitelist. Please try again.
Whitelist.TOASTR_MSG_DELETED: The entry has been removed from the whitelist.
Whitelist.TOASTR_MSG_DELETED_ERROR: Error happened. Entry wasn't delete from whitelist. Please try again.
Whitelist.CLICK_LINK_TO_ANNOUNCEMENT: Click link to see details about announcement

Export.DESCRIPTION: Here you are able to export the complete ROA data set for use in an existing BGP decision making workflow. The output will be in CSV or JSON format and consist of all validated ROAs, minus your ignore filter entries, plus your whitelist additions.

Slurm.UPLOAD_FAILED: Upload failed! Something is wrong with chosen file
